reviews.text: Stayed at this Hotel in Jan 2007 for one night. Check in staff appeared not to know what to do, how to check in guests (took forever). Rooms dirty, tired and in major need of renovation. Spend extra and stay elsewhere. Only good thing is free shuttle to airport
reviews.title: A Tired Dirty Dump

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2006, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: This place is dark, dingy and dated. Almost felt dirty but I think its just worn out. It is ok for a stay either side of a flight but nothing more. The photos make it look better than what it is. However the bar and retsaurant did serve good food and drink and the staff here were friendly. Overall though for the price of the room I guess you get what you pay for. In our case a place to lay your head for afew hours before flying home. Would do it again for convenience and price I guess. The restaurant made up for it. The food was home style and hearty!
reviews.title: Basic old motel

likes.liked: — Close toairport and restaurant and bar

reviews.title: Grubby
reviews.text: A hotel totally lacking in anything but bare necessity. Bored staff seeing the time out, indifferent food - don't send anything back, it makes no difference, and clearly in need of refurbishment. Rooms basic, dim and badly scarred from previous occupants. Wake-up call worked fine and were we glad to get to the airport!

reviews.title: Dingy and dated
reviews.text: This hotel is near the airport and has an efficient shuttle service. That is the positive part. On the flip side, the hotel is shabby and dated. The rooms were freezing (in August). The carpets were torn in places, the decorations dusty, the patio was mildewed. There were heaters in each room but they didn't work well. The restaurant on site is over-priced. Our wake-up call was forgotten. There isn't much in the area within walking distance. I wouldn't stay there again.

The rooms were old and in poor condition ( I tried 2 rooms). There has been minimal maintenance. I should have known something was off when I couldn't get into the front door. It was barricaded wtih a couple luggage carts and the entrance was detoured thru a side door. And I think it says it all - it didn't have cable TV which is unheard of today even in the tiniest accomodations. I was extremely disappointed.
reviews.title: Not a good choice

reviews.text: I stayed there for two nights and found the room to be very tidy. Was unfortunate that my family that drove from Rotorua weren't able to stay in the room with me for a few hours until my daughter arrived on the next flight, but I guess they gave a valid reason. Great that they were able to store my chilly bins of food until I left the next day, also that they allowed my family to use the pool, without kicking them out.
reviews.title: Short Stay

reviews.text: This had to be my worst experience with a hotel anywhere in the world!
reviews.title: Hotel of horror

reviews.text: We stayed in their Premier Suite and were greeted by the strong smell of curry when we walked into our room (I like curry but...) - staff had left the rangehood on to try to remove the smell (FAIL!!).
reviews.title: Charged twice for accomodation!

reviews.text: We found a large black hair on top of the fridge and ants on the kitchen bench.
reviews.title: Park and Fly
Fawlty Towers comes to Auckland
reviews.text: The stove top had not been cleaned since the cooking of the curry.

reviews.title: Would stay again
reviews.text: Had a pleasant experience here.Efficient service and pleasant staff.

reviews.title: Friendly & Practical
reviews.text: Situated as it suggest very near the Airport with a 24 hour to and from Shuttle service it is a fine first stop for late arrivals or as a night before early departure hotel. The staff are friendly and helpful, the rooms though basic are comfortable. The breakfast are well cooked and wholesome. The price is very reasonable and it suited my needs. , consequently I was fully satiosfied

reviews.title: Bad experience
reviews.text: There was a mixed up with our booking date and while waiting for the manager to turn up to clear up our account (the manager wasn't even there at 9 the next morning!), the reception staff refused to give us our breakfast coupons for the two rooms we occupied. By the time the manager turned up, it was too late to have breakfast, because we already have to leave for the airport to catch our onward flight for the South Island. The manager wouldn't even give us a discount for the breakfasts we didn't have! Very bad service, very rude/arrogant reception staff. We will never recommend this hotel to any of our friends. TV reception is non-existence!! There are other hotels near the airport, we will never go back there!

reviews.title: Disgusting
reviews.text: This hotel is absolutely terrible . The staff are ignorant, and rude . The pool was covered up, the room had paint peeling off. When the shuttle was arranged ,prior to being needed, management decided they preferred to watch the rugby and just ignored our request .

reviews.title: Recommended!
reviews.text: Prior arrangement in the morning for the shuttle - he left early leaving us behind , and then refused to take us to the airport, when asked if he had a number for a shuttle we could use he wouldn't not even look or help us . I will never stay there again , and would not recommend this place to anyone.

reviews.title: Very hospitable.
reviews.text: I had a two day layover in Auckland. I stayed here and I have to say that the management was very kind and helpful, the bed was comfortable, the room clean and the staff was very considerate. I would recommend this hotel for a good night's rest.

I stayed here overnight waiting for an international flight in the morning. The Airport Gateway provide a free shuttle bus which was very convenient. The staff were very friendly from the moment I walked in. Although the rooms are old and need a bit of love, the bed was very comfortable and everything that you need is in the rooms (tea, coffee, linen, toiletries etc.) I order dinner which was delicious and once again - very pleasant staff. An enjoyable stay
reviews.title: A nice stay close to the airport

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: As i visited Airport Gateway Hotel it was the place to make person cool and relax from the busy hustle bustle of the travel from airport atmosphere . With their service they made me not happy but I am delightful with their services I would like to say to all better go and stay during your visit to Auckland in this hotel..
reviews.title: Delightful Service

reviews.text: They were very helpful and so kind, when we forgot urgently needed travel documents back in Dunedin. They did their best to assist us to get new travel documents. We couldn't have stayed in a better hotel. We highly appreciate what they have done for us. We can recommend the Airport Gateway Hotel to everyone. Not only because they helped us so much, but also because the rooms are clean and spacious, and the Queen bed we had was comfortable. If I come back to Auckland and need a hotel, I know where to go!
reviews.title: very kind and helpfull

reviews.text: A very convenient location next to the airport with a very prompt pickup service from the airport.
reviews.title: good hospitality

reviews.text: I was met with a pleasant and a friendly staff at the reception.
reviews.title: Great Location

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: My husband and I stayed here before catching an early morning flight. It was okay, but I think there are nicer places to stay closer to the airport. It is quite dated and the facilities were very basic.
reviews.title: Okay for a night

reviews.text: Stayed here for a night to watch the football in Auckland. The hotel is showing its age but was well suited to me for the one night as it was very handy to Mt. Smart. The room whilst dated appeared clean and tidy and was also quiet. Well priced and would stay again.
reviews.title: Okay for the night

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We only stayed here one night as we had a midnight arrival & just wanted somewhere close to the airport.
reviews.title: Well priced hotel

reviews.text: There is a courtesy phone in the arrivals area (note-go left when you come out of the arrivals area at Auckland Apt as we went the wrong way & it took us a while to find it) & they advised over the phone which door their courtesy van would collect us from.
reviews.title: enjoyed staying at airport gateway hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Check-in was quick which is great considering there were a few people checking in & it was after midnight.
reviews.title: Not impressed
